page.title: 09COUNTESTHORPE YOUNG FASHION
page.content: The sort of fashion that we wear is just ordinary clothes such as short skirts just above or just below the knee. We wear floral blouses and T.shirts. A lot of people wear cotton jackets. There are different types of fashion: MODS- wear striped blazers and dark colours which are a throw-back to fashion in the sixties PUNKS-wear black skin-tight trousers that come half way up their shins and leather jackets with studs on them TRENDIES-wear bleached jeans, smartish trousers and jumpers with brand names, eg.Jaeger. Fashionable colours in 1985 are{ { cerise pink, jade green, electric {blue.}Even boys wear pale coloured trousers eg. LEVIS and LOIS.
